NSNumber(Sharype) Class Reference

Category for wrapping Sharype values as NSNumber objects. More...

#import <NSNumber+Sharype.h>

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

(Sharype) - sharypeValue
 Returns the Sharype value of the receiver.

Static Public Member Functions

(NSNumber *) + numberWithSharype:
 Returns an NSNumber representation of a given sharype.

Detailed Description

Category for wrapping Sharype values as NSNumber objects.

Use these methods and you won't have to remember that a Sharype is an ^unsigned^ ^short^ integer.
